price: 13. Bakoyebisa moto mokolo wana maye asalaki na maye atikaki тропа kosala sima.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
